attributes.action: Reduction of rioters benefits / wages by 30% to pay for cleanup
attributes.additional_details: Anyone who is convicted of criminality during civil disorder events, such as the recent riots.  Has their Benefit / salary reduced by 30% to pay for cleaning up  after the event and to help people affected rebuild their lives.  The payments to be in force for 2 years and then reviewed.  If person re offends in this two year period then the 2 year time frame starts again from new offence.
